# Holistic AI SDK

## Table of Contents

- [Installation](#installation)
- [License](#license)

## Installation

```bash
# Run assessments in a self-contained environment
pip install holisticai-sdk

# Run assessments in your local environment
pip install holisticai-sdk[full]
```
